entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brier Island 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 6.5°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 11.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
